entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -23.8°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
